bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Seismic Qualification of Class 1E Metal-Enclosed Power Switchgear Assemblies
IEEE Guide for Seismic Qualification of Class 1E Metal-Enclosed Power Switchgear Assemblies

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard provides specific requirements and guidance for seismic qualification of metal-enclosed power switchgear assemblies. This guide may also be used in other applications in which seismic response of metal-enclosed power switchgear assemblies is a consideration.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C37.81-2017 (Revision of IEEE Std C37.81-1989)
